name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing scalable, high-performance solutions using **Go**, **Ruby**, and **Kubernetes**. My extensive background with cloud services includes **AWS** and my strong database management skills are demonstrated through my expertise in **PostgreSQL**. I am well-versed in implementing **event-driven architecture** and utilizing messaging systems like **Kafka**, reinforcing my capability in building responsive and resilient applications.
In addition to my technical skills, I have a solid foundation in **Domain-Driven Design**, which enables the creation of well-structured systems that align with business needs. I leverage tools such as **ELK** for logging, which enhances code quality and observability.
My original strengths include team collaboration, effective communication, and a problem-solving mindset, enabling me to lead and contribute to high-impact projects while fostering an environment of curiosity and innovation.
